tags.inscription: MALCOLM LOWRY 1909 – 1957  Malcolm Lowry, author, lived with his wife Margerie in a squatter’s shack near this site from 1940 – 1954. His writings have won the Governor General’s award for fiction and his novel UNDER THE VOLCANO is oft declared one of the
tags.name: Malcolm Lowry

This plaque stands as a memorial to
Timothy E. Jones
Advanced Life Support Paramedic and
North Shore Rescue Team Member

His legacy is serving the people
of BC selflessly for over 30 years. This includes
saving hundreds of lives, as a volunteer, in
Mount

tags.inscription:
TAKE NOTICE that by indenture Dated April 21, 1913 areas outlined on the plan inscribed below were leased by the Government of Canada to the City of Vancouver for a term of ninety-nine years computed from the 1st day of May 1912.

AND FURTHER TAKE NOTICE

The pioneering design and construction
of this tunnel between Coquitlam and Buntzen reservoirs
allowed the region to begin to convert from fossil fuel
generation to clean and plentiful hydro power in 1906.

tags.inscription:
Call To Nature
The sky, the earth, and all between.
The sights, the sounds
and scents not seen,
they clear the mind,
they soothe the soul, they heal the spirit,
and make you whole.
God's precious gift is always free,
and all I ask - come walk with me.
tags.name: Janet Wright 1940-2012
